tutorialNextButton.description: Button to go to next tutorial step

tutorialPrevButton.description: Button to go to previous tutorial step

tutorialSubtitle.message: Let's explore all the amazing features

tutorialPinChatsDesc.message: Keep your most important conversations at the top

tutorialPinStep1Message.message: Hover over the highlighted chat and click the three dots (‚ãØ) menu that appears

tutorialPinStep2Message.message: Click 'Pin Chat' to add it to your pinned collection

tutorialPinStep3Message.message: All your pinned chats appear here for quick access!

tutorialDragDropDesc.message: Organize your pinned chats by dragging them around

tutorialDragStep1Message.message: Click and hold any pinned chat, then drag it to reorder

tutorialDragStep2Message.message: Arrange your chats in the order that works best for you!

tutorialBookmarksDesc.message: Save and organize important messages within conversations

tutorialBookmarkStep1Message.message: Click the bookmark button next to important messages

tutorialBookmarkStep2Message.message: Click this button to view all your saved bookmarks

tutorialBookmarkStep3Message.message: Search, edit names, and organize your bookmarks here

tutorialRenameDesc.message: Give your pinned chats custom names for better organization

tutorialRenameStep1Message.message: Right-click or use the options button on any pinned chat

tutorialRenameStep2Message.message: Select 'Rename' to give your chat a custom name

tutorialShortcutsDesc.message: Use keyboard shortcuts for faster pinning

tutorialShortcutStep1Message.message: Use the keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+P by default) to quickly pin the current conversation

tutorialShortcutStep2Message.message: Right-click on the extension icon to access settings and customize your pin shortcuts
